TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileGroupSettingsCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileGroupSettingsCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含一系列对象，其中的每个包含一系列对象。The class contains a collection of objects, which each contain a collection of objects. 类使您能够以编程方式创建、 访问和修改的单个属性添加到定义``子节``配置文件的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `` subsection of the `` section of a configuration file. ``配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息``部分，以生成一个名为类`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性``子节``配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `` subsection of the `` section of the configuration file. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 有关添加到 ASP.NET 2.0 版中的配置文件功能的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to ASP.NET version 2.0, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 以下配置文件摘录显示了如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值作为``的元素``元素的``配置文件节。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the as `` elements of the `` element of the `` configuration file section. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`clear`指令插入要清除在更高级的配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用的配置文件的相应部分。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 删除当前的配置文件的相应部分中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入``到更高级的配置文件中定义的任何元素的配置文件的相应部分的元素。This method inserts a `` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果该元素定义当前配置文件的相应部分中，从配置文件中移除其项。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 要移除的对象集合中必须存在。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
